title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The software takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. There is no indication of any activity or progress such as a busy cursor while the update is ongoing.
EB: The software should display a busy cursor while updating the checked state of the table, to indicate that it is performing a task and to provide feedback to the user that the update is in progress.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software and navigate to the table with checkboxes.
2. Perform an action that triggers the update of the checked state.
3. Observe that it takes a long time for the update to complete, and there is no visual indication of progress such as a busy cursor.
